title: NASA Flights Study Cosmic Ray Effects for Air, Future Space Travelers
summary: Recent airborne science flights to Greenland are improving NASA’s understanding of space weather by measuring radiation exposure to air travelers and validating global radiation maps used in flight path planning. This unique data also has value beyond the Earth as a celestial roadmap for using the same instrumentation to monitor radiation levels for travelers entering […]

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 24 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from Vandenberg
summary: The Starlink 17-11 mission includes the 475th launch of a flight-proven booster. SpaceX is targeting liftoff from pad 4E at Vandenberg Space Force Base at 9:17 p.m. PDT (12:17 a.m. EDT / 0417 UTC).

summary:

title: NASA Opens 2026 Human Lander Challenge for Life Support Systems, More
summary: NASA’s 2026 Human Lander Challenge is seeking ideas from college and university students to help evolve and transform technologies for life support and environmental control systems. These systems are critical for sustainable, long-duration human spaceflight missions to the Moon, Mars, and beyond.
